name: Another SharePoint Files Uploader
description: A strong release task to upload files in a folder to a SharePoint Library.
author: Ramzi Debab, Ooredoo Algeria AdminSharePoint Team
helpMarkDown: You can easily copy files in a folder to SharePoint Library!

inputs.name: URL
inputs.label: Library URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to the library. If the library name is Lib and the site url is http://spSite/sites/Site so the required URL is http://spSite/sites/Site/Lib

inputs.name: USER
inputs.label: User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The User Name that has write privileges on the SharePoint Library. The format is as follows : DOMAIN\USERNAME

inputs.name: FOLDER
inputs.label: Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder path from which the files are copied like d:\folder\*

inputs.name: OVERWRITE
inputs.label: OverWrite?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to overwrite the SharePoint Library?
